fields.description: The CosmosDB (MongoDB API) connection string. Type: string, SecureString or AzureKeyVaultSecretReference. Type: string, SecureString or AzureKeyVaultSecretReference.
fields.name: ConnectionString

fields.description: The name of the CosmosDB (MongoDB API) database that you want to access. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Database

fields.description: Whether the CosmosDB (MongoDB API) server version is higher than 3.2. The default value is false. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: IsServerVersionAbove32
